solution_line_template: Becky started with {initial_necklaces} necklaces and then got rid of {broken_necklaces}, {initial_necklaces} - {broken_necklaces} = <<{initial_necklaces}-{broken_necklaces}={after_broken}>>{after_broken} necklaces.
Becky buys {new_necklaces} new necklaces that week, {after_broken} + {new_necklaces} = <<{after_broken}+{new_necklaces}={after_buying}>>{after_buying} necklaces.
She gives 17 of her necklaces as gifts to friends, {after_buying} - {given_away} = <<{final_necklaces}={final_necklaces}>>{final_necklaces} necklaces Becky owns now.
